text: Sankt Augustin is a town in the Rhein-Sieg district, in North Rhine- Westphalia, Germany. It is named after the patron saint of the Divine Word Missionaries, Saint Augustine of Hippo (354-430). Sankt Augustin is twinned with: * Grantham, United Kingdom * Mevaseret Zion, Israel * Szentes, Hungary ==References== Category:Rhein-Sieg Rural District
title: Sankt Augustin
